price: Enti Yɛtuaa wͻn so ka, maa nsuo faa wͻn wͻ ɛpo no mu, efirisε wͻbuu Yεn nsεnkyerεnee no nkontonposεm, na wͻbuu wͻn ani nso guu so.
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَكَانُواْ عَنۡهَا غَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum fī al-yami bi-annahum kadhabū biāyātinā wakānū ʿanhā ghāfilīna
